description: Young chef Graziano Accolla has returned to his native city where he serves creative cuisine of the highest quality, while at the same time raising Augusta’s gastronomic profile. Thanks to his experience in Michelin-starred restaurants, he offers highly interesting dishes which focus on the use of top-quality ingredients.
